name: Woolwich Community Health Centre
comment:
Health centre focused on family and community health * health professionals assess and treat non-life-threatening injuries or illnesses * referrals to other local health services and personal development groups

Community-led health teams develop programs to improve the social supports and conditions that affect long-term health
  • Lab services - by appointment only for registered patients
  • Health Children, Youth and Families programs
  • Healthy Living programs
  • Healthy Minds programs
  • Healthy Aging programs
  • Baby Friendly Initiative
  • fitness programs


Services and Programs:
  • Linwood Nurse Practitioner Office
  • Wellesley Township Community Health Centre
  • Youth Centre
serviceProvisionCode: Most medical services covered by OHIP * some fees for other programs
